string.value: I heard #p1022002# of #m102000000# was visited by a group of strange people the other day...

#p1022002# told me a group of strangers came up to him and asked for help. He politely declined, but felt bad about it, and have been thinking about it ever since. He desired to send someone to help them for him, and asked me to prove my worth to him so he can send me there.\n\n#o2130100# #r#a21221#
I took care of 15 #o2130100#s, gaining approval from #p1022002#.
곤란하군... 자꾸 신경이 쓰이는 걸...?\r\n#L0# #b무슨 일인가요?#l
얼마 전, 수상한 사람들이 날 찾아왔었어. 멀리서 찾아왔다면서 자신들을 도와 달라고 하더군. 의로운 일이라면 당연히 도와줘야 했지만, 그들은 자신들이 누구인지, 어떤 일을 하려고 하는지에 대해서 일절 밝히지도 않았지.\r\n#L0# #b나쁜 사람들이었을까요?#l
글쎄...그건 알 수 없지만, 악인들처럼 보이지는 않았어. 그들의 눈빛에서 강한 의지를 느낄 수 있었거든. 하지만 난 이곳에서 해야할 일이 있기 때문에 그들의 부탁을 거절했지. 하지만 계속 마음에 걸리는군. 어떤가? 자네가 나 대신 그들을 도와 주는 것은?
This is not good... for some reason I keep thinking about those people..So strange...\r\n#L0# #bWhat is it?#l

A while ago, a group of strangers came to see me. They claimed to have come a long way to see me, and asked me if I could help them. If it's for a good deed, I'm all for it--but they did not reveal any information about themselves. Kind of hard to trust someone when they don't open up to you. I have no idea who they are, or what they want to do with me.\r\n#L0# #bDo you think they have bad intentions?#l

Well... that, I don't know, but they didn't seem too bad. I could definitely see the desire in their eyes. Eventually, I had to say no to them, because I had to take care of another matter... but it's been really bothering me ever since. What do you think? Can you help them out for me?
I guess you've made your choice. If you want to help them, you'll need to show me your skills so I can make sure you're strong enough.
I need to see if you can really help them or not, so I must test your strength. #r10 #o2130100#s#k should be good enough.
Okay, I understand. A lot of things about them remain uncertain, and ... I understand that it's hard to help out strangers that you know nothing of. Please return to me if you change your mind.
You're back. I see that you're more than capable of helping them!
Let me know when you're ready to make your way there, and I'll show you the way.
I don't think that's enough to prove your strength. You must be stronger than this! Come back when you've defeated all #r15 #o2130100#s#k.
